basics.name: Sergio Acosta Quintana
basics.label: Full-Stack Engineer (Backend Focused) | Java & Cloud
basics.summary: Full-Stack Engineer (Backend-focused) specializing in high-availability microservices and event-driven architectures. Modernized enterprise systems at IKEA, improving latency, reliability, and efficiency. Focused on distributed systems, cloud infrastructure, and automation. Proficient in React/TypeScript for full-stack autonomy. Experienced in distributed international teams.

work.name: IKEA / BITBOX S.L.
highlights: Architected Spring Boot microservices for IKEA's loyalty platform processing 2M+ monthly transactions for 400k+ users with 99.9% uptime SLA.
Led PL/SQL to Kafka migration (15+ topics, 50k+ daily events) implementing circuit breakers, retry logic, and Prometheus/Grafana monitoring.
Automated pipelines via GitHub Actions replacing 7 manual jobs, reducing processing 55%. Configured Docker builds and scheduled backups.
Designed multi-provider insurance system with JWT auth, RBAC, API rate limiting, and async event processing with failover mechanisms.

projects.name: NEXO CLOUD (SaaS)
highlights: Architected production-grade RAG system (Spring Boot + Redis + R2) processing 30k+ docs monthly. Implemented Testcontainers for integration testing.
Designed async pipeline (1k+ docs/hour, p99 <200ms) with event sourcing, worker pools, and dead letter queues. Automated PostgreSQL backups.
Built React dashboard for document monitoring with JWT auth UI. Optimized costs 30% via caching, batch processing, and query tuning.

education.institution: University of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria
